egyptian.title: Neophyte / Amun

celtic.title: Wanderer / Young Merlin
celtic.motif: raw magical potential before role, trust in wild land and spirits

shinto.title: The Void / Izanagi
shinto.motif: wanderer-creator poised over chaos, shaping a half-formed world
shinto.visual: standing on the floating bridge of heaven, stirring the sea toward islands

egyptian.title: Osiris / Thoth

celtic.title: Shaman / Taliesin
celtic.motif: inspired speech as magic, mediator of seen and unseen

shinto.title: Inari Ōkami
shinto.motif: material manifestation and prosperity; intention into harvest
shinto.visual: rice, fox messengers, shrine blessings turning seed to abundance

egyptian.title: Isis
egyptian.motif: veiled mysteries, keeper of true names and resurrective secrets

celtic.title: Seer / Cerridwen
celtic.motif: guardian of the cauldron of awen; filters deep knowing

shinto.title: Ame-no-Uzume
shinto.motif: ecstatic trance and humor revealing hidden light

egyptian.title: Hathor

celtic.title: The Lady / Danu

shinto.title: Konohanasakuya-hime
shinto.motif: transient blossom beauty and fertile flowering

egyptian.title: Horus
egyptian.motif: divine mandate, sky oversight, unifier of the Two Lands
egyptian.visual: falcon-crowned ruler holding the kingdoms together

celtic.title: The Lord / Green Man
celtic.motif: order as ecological stewardship and virile guardianship

shinto.title: Ōkuninushi
shinto.motif: nation-builder, healer, arranger of fields and treaties

egyptian.title: Ptah / Anubis

celtic.title: Druid / Ancestor
celtic.motif: elder lore-keeper, initiatory gate through stones

shinto.title: Omoikane

egyptian.title: Geb & Nut
egyptian.motif: cosmic lovers separated so life can occur between

celtic.title: Forest Lovers (Stag & Doe)
celtic.motif: ecological pairing, seasonal dance of wild masculine/feminine
celtic.visual: stag and doe facing in the greenwood, year turning

shinto.title: Izanagi & Izanami
shinto.motif: creation and irreversible rift; honeymoon and Yomi both present
shinto.visual: primordial couple with jeweled spear over chaotic sea

egyptian.title: War Chariot
egyptian.motif: state-backed disciplined advance, vehicle of empire
egyptian.visual: pharaoh in light chariot driving over foes

celtic.title: Archer
celtic.motif: aimed intent, everything drawn taut to one decisive shot
celtic.visual: bow at full draw, grounded stance, seasonal focus

shinto.title: Hachiman
shinto.motif: divinely guided campaign, martial force with civic mandate
shinto.visual: war-banner and bow of the clan-protecting kami

egyptian.title: Shai / Sphinx
egyptian.motif: fate allotted by cosmic decree, riddling thresholds

celtic.motif: Samhain to Beltane cycles; life rises and falls with the land

shinto.motif: impermanence felt through blossoms, rice cycles, harvests

shinto.motif: attachments and delusions personified; trickster punishment of arrogance

celtic.motif: nature reclaiming stagnant structures; shamanic knock from the tree

shinto.title: Susanoo

egyptian.title: Nut / The Universe
egyptian.motif: cosmic containment; the world held in a living sky-body
egyptian.visual: starry goddess arching over earth, birthing the sun anew

celtic.title: World Tree
celtic.motif: ecological integration of underworld, middleworld, upperworld
celtic.visual: great tree with roots, trunk, crown bridging three realms

shinto.title: Amaterasu
shinto.motif: cosmos fully illuminated and seen; the clear mirror moment
